thread.title: Indiana Do Not Call List sign-up deadline today
thread.title_full: Indiana Do Not Call List sign-up deadline today

author: joe.tamborello@indystar.com
title: Indiana Do Not Call List sign-up deadline today
text:
Indiana Do Not Call List sign-up deadline today Joe Tamborello , joe.tamborello@indystar.com Published 9:06 a.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 | Updated 2 hours ago Buy Photo Stop unwanted telemarketing calls by entering your name on Indiana's Do Not Call List. (Photo: Joe Tamborello/IndyStar) Buy Photo 158 CONNECT 3 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Today is the deadline to have your phone number added to Indiana's Do Not Call List this April. 
Adding your name and phone number to the state's Do Not Call List will prevent the majority of telemarketing calls from reaching your home phone, cellphone or VOIP line. This includes both calls with a live human being and robocalls. 
Indiana's list is updated quarterly in January, April, July and October. If you have previously added your number to the list, you'll only need to update your registration if you've changed addresses or your phone number has changed. You can check to see if your number is included by visiting this page of the Office of the Indiana Attorney General's website . 
If you have not added your number yet, get started here. You'll need to provide your name and current address along with up to 10 different phone numbers you'd like added to the list. 
Follow IndyStar Social Media Platforms Editor Joe Tamborello on Twitter and Instagram . Read or Share this story: http://indy.st/2lqOnCG TOP VIDEOS
